meanings.definition: Viking ships used for trade and warfare.
meanings.sent1: The longships sailed across the sea with fierce warriors on board.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a replica of the ancient longships used by Vikings.
meanings.sent3: The longships decided to have a race to see who could reach the shore first.
meanings.sent4: In the battle, the longships were like swift predators hunting their prey.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the longships approaching struck fear into the hearts of their enemies.

meanings.definition: A type of boat with a long, narrow design.
meanings.sent1: The longships were built for speed and agility in the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen preferred using longships for their fishing expeditions.
meanings.sent3: The longships lined up neatly in the harbor, looking like slender arrows ready to launch.
meanings.sent4: The sleek longships glided gracefully through the waves like elegant swans.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the longships added a touch of artistry to their practical design.

meanings.sent1: We decided to longships to explore the distant lands across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Many adventurers longships to reach new territories and discover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent3: The tourists longships to experience the thrill of sailing like ancient seafarers.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, we longships back to our homeland, reminiscing about our adventures.
meanings.sent5: The explorers longships through stormy weather, facing challenges with courage and determination.
